content.text:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
As a senior Elementary School Teacher, I will:

1. Thoroughly review and understand all school policies and rules
2. Clearly communicate expectations to students at the start of the year
3. Consistently apply rules and consequences fairly to all students
4. Use positive reinforcement to encourage good behavior
5. Address rule violations promptly and appropriately
6. Document incidents and interventions as required
7. Collaborate with administration on serious infractions
8. Keep parents informed of behavioral concerns and consequences
9. Model expected behavior and adherence to rules
10. Regularly review and reinforce rules throughout the school year
11. Adapt enforcement strategies as needed for individual students
12. Participate in staff training on policy implementation
13. Contribute to policy reviews and updates when appropriate
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
